item.title: Switching to Moonlander Keyboard
item.description: [UPDATE] So, my moonlander keyboard from ZSA arrived today. Ah, the hopes and dreams I had for this keyboard… But, after actually typing on it, I’m very nervous right now. There was a WPM test on their oryx configurator and I naturally tried it out. For first several times, it couldn’t even calculate my WPM because accuracy was below 95%. Eventually I ended up getting 22, this is my WPM now.
